# MarketplaceV3EnglishAuctions.closeAuctionForSeller() method

Close the english auction for the seller

## Example

```javascript
// The ID of the auction you want to close
const auctionId = "0";
await contract.englishAuctions.closeAuctionForSeller(auctionId);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
closeAuctionForSeller(auctionId: BigNumberish): Promise<TransactionResult>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description             |
| --------- | ------------ | ----------------------- |
| auctionId | BigNumberish | the auction id to close |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[TransactionResult](./sdk.transactionresult.md)&gt;

the transaction result

## Remarks

Closes the Auction and executes the sale for the seller.
